title: As Corruption Cases Flood Courts, Punishments Often Seen as Inconsistent
text: Some dirty officials are getting tough sentences, but others who took far more money are being shown leniency, a problem linked to vague legislation By staff reporter Lin Zizhen ( Beijing ) â€“ After Chen Bokui, the deputy head of a government
